format_instructions: DO NOT MODIFY - This template defines the expected JSON output structure for the legal lens system

required_structure.overall_assessment: STRING - Brief summary of compliance status

violations.rule_name: STRING - Name of the violated legal rule
violations.category: STRING - Legal category (e.g., healthcare, financial, general)
violations.specific_issue: STRING - Specific part of content that violates the rule
violations.recommendation: STRING - How to fix the violation

warnings.rule_name: STRING - Name of rule with potential issues
warnings.description: STRING - Potential concern or risk area
warnings.recommendation: STRING - Suggestion for improvement or risk mitigation

required_structure.analysis_summary: STRING - Detailed explanation of the legal analysis performed

severity_levels.critical: Immediate legal risk, must be addressed before publication
severity_levels.high: Significant legal risk, strong recommendation to address
severity_levels.medium: Moderate risk, should be addressed when possible
severity_levels.low: Minor concern, consider addressing for best practices

validation_rules.severity_values: Must be one of: low, medium, high, critical
validation_rules.required_fields: All main structure fields must be present
validation_rules.arrays_can_be_empty: Violations and warnings arrays can be empty if no issues found

usage_note: This template ensures consistent legal analysis output for UI parsing and risk assessment display.
